alert.note: Alert for Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 11:25PM CDT until May 13 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR MEDINA...CENTRAL BANDERA...SOUTHEASTERN KERR...NORTHEASTERN UVALDE...NORTH CENTRAL FRIO AND WEST CENTRAL BEXAR COUNTIES... At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Utopia to near Yancey, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Medina, Hondo, Castroville, Bandera, Tarpley, Sabinal, Lacoste, Camp Verde, D`Hanis, Bandera Falls, Noonan, Quihi, Dunlay, Mico, Pearson, Pipe Creek, Utopia, Sea World and Bader. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
